titles.title: Private Activity Bond Clarification Act of 1999
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to clarify certain existing limitations on private business use of facilities financed with tax-exempt bonds.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 6/30/1999--Introduced. Private Activity Bond Clarification Act of 1999 - Amends subpart A (Private Activity Bonds) of part IV (Tax Exemption Requirements for State and Local Bonds) of the Internal Revenue Code to revise the definition of the term "private business use."
